name: War Tycoon
description:
The world is at war, Someone has to supply all the weapons and ammo, why can't that someone be you? Well, now it can! Build your way up from the bottom the easy way, as a weapons dealer. Corrupt everything you touch, slowly build up your network and wealth, can you top the global leaderboard?

As you climb the ranks and raise enough capital you will be able to make deals with countries. From China to the United States there is no time to sit around. They say wars strengthen economies, just remember to make sure you get your cut.
